page.title: 05Deal Parochial School
page.content:
The school opened in{1853.}The buildings are old and need to be decorated. There are six classrooms, four for the Juniors and two for the Infants. We have two halls, a swimming pool, a library, a playground and a school field. There six teachers, a headmaster, a secretary and caretaker. The school's{Parent Teacher {Association}(PTA) raises money and has bought a television, radios, a computer and a video recorder.
Sometimes parents help with{sports}and outings. We do many sports at this school including football, netball, swimming and rounders. In the 1984-85 season the{football team}has been very successful winning a trophy in an 11 a-side competition and two in 6 a-side competitions.
